attributes.action: Scrap Inheritance Tax for working family farms.
attributes.additional_details: The new inheritance tax will affect 70,000 farms across the country. Including 3479 in Lincolnshire (Defra June Survey of Agriculture)
attributes.background: We would like to get rid of inheritance tax for working family farms that have been passed down generations as it massively affects our area, Lincolnshire. This inheritance tax creates a severe disadvantage for family farms who provide food for our country and money for our economy.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Don't change inheritance tax relief for working farms 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
